1.question: Finn has 89 goldfish. 32 of the goldfish die. How many goldfish are left?

3.question: Mikey had 356 leaves. Some of her leaves blew away. Now she has 112 leaves left. How many of her leaves blew away?

2.question: Jane has 28 old, brown sheets of drawing paper and 27 old, yellow sheets of drawing paper. How many pieces of drawing paper does she have?

5.question: Gavin has 23 shirts. 6 are blue the rest are green. How many green shirts does Gavin have?

4.question: Marcus has 210 baseball cards. He has 58 more than Carter. How many baseball cards does Carter have?

6.question: Ethan has 31 presents. Alissa has 22 more than Ethan. How many presents does Alissa have?
